modName: Lingerie Set for Sevenbase Bombshell BBP
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][color=#C0C0C0]Lingerie Set[/color][/size]
[size=3][color=#C0C0C0]Sevenbase Bombshell BBP[/color][/size]
[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7332/12634880993_92974f6e6f_c.jpg[/img]
[/center]

-Weight slider supported
- Probably some minor clipping there and there.
- Some textures clipping on a few dresses.
- Some clipping on a few dresses.

Requires:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/]SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer[/url] by Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34308/?]Lingerie Set for the UNPB BBP Body [/url]by _kzk_

Credits and Thanks
Conversion of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34308/?]Lingerie Set for the UNPB BBP Body by _kzk_[/url]
NPR for the original Lingerie Set
Petrovich for UNP Undies
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/]SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer[/url] by Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity
ACanOfWin for esp file
follardo for Transparency Fix
author: furiousreason
